Html: This ribbon control is not running in Visual Studio 2012 Ultimate Update 1!!! Why??? Please help me. It is constantly saying that "RibbonGenerator was not found on your computer". I have it installed in Windows 8 64-bit machine with VS 2012 Update 1.

The error messages means that the custom tool (RibbonGenerator) is not installed and registered correctly for Visual Studio 2012.

For more detailed information about how to register please read the following posts...

Manual Registration

Other details

The setup included in the download package does not support Visual Studio 2012. So you need to register the custom tool manually as described in the blog posts from above.

Try running devenv.exe /setup afterwards. After running this and opening a new instance of Visual Studio 2012, I was able to successfully use the RibbonGenerator.

Another note:
I had also changed InprocServer32 to C:\WINDOWS\SysWOW64\mscoree.dll (from C:\WINDOWS\ system32 \mscoree.dll )

I cannot understand what to do! Can you provide complete instructions?
Thanks in advance.
RibbonBar Control for WinForms in Visual Studio 2012.

I've the same problem, what's the solution please a don't want to comeback to VS 2010 :(.

I've tried to solve it by Manual Registration but alwayse the same problem.

Please because i've a GUI using RibbonLib 2,6 and it's buzzy to change it and going to WPF Windows Ribbon.

Thanks in advance.
